ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Playing a rogue
ygData.msgSnippet: GL!  Myself, I might or might not get on my monk, but I probably won t hunt.  I ll probably put most of my time into my 8 froggy cleric (solo ing WC atm). Quwi
ygData.messageBody:
GL! Myself, I might or might not get on my monk, but
I probably won't hunt. I'll probably put most of my
time into my 8 froggy cleric (solo'ing WC atm).

Quwi Changkane Grandmaster Fenin Ro
Bouncyfrog 8 Cleric Fenin Ro

--- Wulfric Rennison <wulftech@...> wrote:
> So I made some serious headway tonight with my
> rogue. A few of my friends said that they'd group
> in Dawnshroud at the Grieg's End zone. from
> 1:30-2:30 I made my way from Frontier Mountains to
> Dawnshroud Peaks. It took that long in rogue
> sneak/hide to avoid aggro. I didn't have a sow.
>
> We met up at Maidens eye zone. Myself, a ranger, a
> mage, another rogue, and a monk. I said "Now if we
> only have a cleric" and miraculously I see "You guys
> need a cleric?" appear on my screen. So the 6 of us
> made our way to Grieg's End zone line and set up
> base. For the next 6 hours we then proceeded to
> murder, slaughter, and bring the wrath upon tribals
> and anything else that dared cross our paths. In
> the ntire 6 hours we had only 3 deaths. The monk
> had a higher level cleric alt with a 75% rez so we
> were golden. Everyone in the group dinged at least
> once. Our group's cleric dinged 29 and got his new
> rez spell for which he was happy. It was a good
> time.
>
> After the group broke up, I hung around DSP to find
> another group. I was able to do so and we had a
> froglok warrior who was busting out the chain pulls.
> In the new group I managed to ding a second time.
> By midnight, a mere 9 hours into it, I went from one
> 6 blues to 33 to 2 yellows into 34, which is equal
> to about a level and a half. Needless to say I was
> pretty pleased with myself, and I realized sometimes
> it's not about what you get to look forward to, but
> just the fun you have playing the character. So I'm
> trying to finish off 34 this weekend and hopefully
> make some good headway into 35 - maybe even 36.
>
> Wulfric Rennison
> 34 Half Elf Rogue
> Cazic Thule server
